RecordFileStrategy<K,V>
public abstract class SimpleTextRecordFileStrategy<K,V>
extends TextRecordFileStrategy<K,V>

A TextRecordFileStrategy that uses a vertical bar delimiter and html escaping.

Author:
Spence Koehler
